name: Next Car Game: A Motorsport With Attitude! (Canceled)
blurb: A demolition racing game with spectacular crashes, realistic driving physics and intense car building from the\u00a0makers of FlatOut!

rewards.reward: DIGITAL CHRISTMAS CARD\r\n==============================\r\nEvery little bit counts! We sincerely appreciate your support, and as our thank-you, we will send you a digital Christmas card from the whole Bugbear Team!

\u201cKICKSTARTER SPECIAL\u201d \u2022 PC DIGITAL GAME + SNEAK PEEK ==============================\r\nDigital download of the game for PC and a playable sneak peek technology demo, released right after our Kickstarter campaign.  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

"WEEKEND SMASHER" \u2022 EARLY ACCESS + EXCLUSIVE WALLPAPERS\r\n==============================\r\nCatch a head start with Early Access and a pack of mood-setting, exclusive wallpapers! You\u2019ll also get a digital download of the game for PC and a playable sneak peek technology demo. Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

"FULL-TIME WRECKER" \u2022 SPECIAL BACKER CAR, EXCLUSIVE DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK + FULL-TIME WRECKER COMMUNITY BADGE\r\n============================== \r\nYou want the full experience, including the special Backer race car only available for limited time? Sure thing! You\u2019ll also get the exclusive digital soundtrack, Full-Time Wrecker badge on the community forum and a lot of other awesome content.  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cMASTER BLASTER" COLLECTOR'S EDITION \u2022 EXCLUSIVE DERBY CAR, NAME IN THE GAME, DIGITAL MAKING-OF BOOK + MASTER BLASTER COMMUNITY BADGE\r\n============================== \r\nBe a Master Blaster and get a super exclusive derby car that the community will decide what it will be \u2013 how about a school bus? A hearse? Maybe an excavator! Sounds crazy, but you decide! Your name will also be featured in the in-game classified ads for the whole world to see, PLUS you\u2019ll get a gorgeous digital making-of book and a rocking Master Blaster badge on the community forum, not to mention the whole lot of other goodies!  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

"FULL-TIME WRECKER" BOXED\r\n============================== The full experience in a physical form! You\u2019ll get the whole Full-Time Wrecker experience AND a physical boxed copy of the game for PC. Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cMASTER BLASTER" BOXED\r\n============================== Master Blaster Collector's Edition \u2013 BOXED! You\u2019ll get all the great stuff included in the Master Blaster Collector\u2019s Edition PLUS a physical boxed copy of the game for PC. How cool is that?  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cTEAM BUGBEAR MEMBER\u201d SPECIAL EDITION \u2022 YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS UNDER HONORARY TEAM MEMBERS, EXCLUSIVE TEAM BUGBEAR PAINT JOB + TEAM BUGBEAR MEMBER COMMUNITY BADGE\r\n============================== Become a Bugbearian! You\u2019ll receive a seriously exclusive Team Bugbear car paint job and Team Bugbear member community badge to show everyone that you\u2019re rolling with the Bugbear guys. You'll also get your name listed in the game\u2019s credits under honorary team members, not to mention a bunch of other digital goodness!  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cTEAM BUGBEAR MEMBER" BOXED SPECIAL EDITION \u2022 BOXED GAME + EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT.\r\n==============================\r\nYou\u2019ll get all the Team Bugbear Member goodies and a really, really exclusive t-shirt only available for limited time as well as a physical boxed copy of the PC game, not to mention a whole lot of other cool stuff!  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cSCREWDRIVER\u201d PACK \u2022 EXCLUSIVE POSTER, SCREWDRIVER COMMUNITY BADGE + BOXED GAME\r\n==============================\r\nMake wrecks, not war! You\u2019ll get to spread wrecking love with an exclusive poster, a t-shirt, a super hot Screwdriver badge on the community forum, a physical boxed copy of the PC game and a bundle of other lovely things.  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cCRASH CHAMPION\u201d EDITION \u2022 EXCLUSIVE 3D PRINTED AMERICAN RACING CAR, CRASH CHAMPION COMMUNITY BADGE + BOXED GAME\r\n==============================\r\nAre you a Crash Champion? If you are, this stuff is for you! You\u2019ll get to race like a champ with a very exclusive 3D printed plastic American racing car and show your undisputed awesomeness with a Crash Champion badge on the community forum. Naturally you\u2019ll also get a load of other neat stuff, including a physical boxed copy of the PC game!  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cBUGBEAR VEHICLE ARTIST\u201d \u2022 GET TO DESIGN A PAINT JOB, VEHICLE ARTIST COMMUNITY BADGE, EXCLUSIVE SIGNED PRINTED MAKING-OF BOOK + SIGNED POSTER\r\n============================== \r\nDesign a car paint job with us that EVERYONE will get to see in the game! If you know how to  design a sketch or have a sweet idea, we know how to put it in-game. You\u2019ll also get the printed making-of book and the poster, both signed by the Bugbear team, an exclusive Track Designer badge on the community forum, a physical boxed copy of the PC game as well as a wealth of other goodies!  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cBUGBEAR TRACK DESIGNER\u201d \u2022 GET TO DESIGN A TRACK + TRACK DESIGNER COMMUNITY BADGE\r\n==============================\r\nKnow how to design a killer derby or race track? Awesome, let\u2019s put it in the game! You\u2019ll first submit a sketch or an idea to us, after which you'll get to work closely with our Level Design team to recreate it in the game. You\u2019ll also get the printed making-of book and the poster, both signed by the Bugbear team, as well as a very exclusive Track Designer badge on the community forum, a boxed copy of the PC game and a load of other nice stuff!  Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cSAUNA + SPEED DAY\u201d \u2022 A DAY AT THE RACE TRACK AND SAUNA WITH THE TEAM\r\n==============================\r\nTake it to the track with the Bugbear guys! Fly to Finland and get down to the race track, where you can either challenge one of the Bugbear guys yourself in rallycross or simply enjoy the thrill of speed by riding shotgun to a professional driving. Should you want to attack the track yourself, professional coaching at the track is arranged. We will finish off the speed day in a traditional Finnish way of having a sauna and a nice meal with a choice selection of fitting drinks. One hotel night at a hotel in Helsinki is included in the price. Needless to say, you\u2019ll also get all the goodies! Flights to and from Finland are not included. Note that dates may vary depending on availability. Please see the rewards chart for full contents.

\u201cMEET SANTA!\u201d \u2022 GET TO MEET SANTA CLAUS IN LAPLAND\r\n==============================\r\nFOR TWO PERSONS! Bring your best friend or significant other with you and spend a weekend in snowy Arctic Circle, Lapland of Northern Finland. Experience the breathtaking Finnish nature in winter, enjoy skiing or take a ride in reindeer sleigh, see the famous northern lights, and of course, get to meet the one and only Santa! Includes one night in Helsinki, two nights in a cosy Lapland resort in the Rovaniemi region and return flight from Helsinki to Lapland. Needless to say, you\u2019ll also get all the other goodies to bring back with you as Christmas presents! Flights to and from Finland are not included. Note that dates may vary depending on availability. Please see the rewards chart for full contents.
